channel.title: Scroll bar background help
channel.description:
Well I need help changing the color of the ugly white background of my scroll bar. I have almost every sprite loaded from the sprites folder but the scroll bar is not loaded through the sprites folder.
[url=http://img710.imageshack.us/i/482011112958pm.png/][img]http://img710.imageshack.us/img710/9018/482011112958pm.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://img9.imageshack.us/i/482011113127pm.png/][img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/3667/482011113127pm.png[/img][/url]

item.title: Scroll bar background help
item.dc:creator: @_James_scape _James_scape
item.description:
@_James_scape wrote:

hello I have successfully replaced my cache with two other caches. The background still has that ugly whitish color. I don’t think it’s from the cache. I looked in all of my folder which may have that background and it’s not there.

EDIT: I followed this tutorial, http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/67719-non-renamed-new-runescape-scroller.html. It does have a new scrollbar, but I personally like that one better.

rune*-server*

Read full topic

item.title: Scroll bar background help
item.dc:creator: @neonscapeftw neonscapeftw
item.description:
@neonscapeftw wrote:

You’re probably missing the file from the cache its self. I recommended replacing the cache you have atm, with another cache FROM YOUR CLIENT(assuming you backup files) just C&P your other cache file over the existing cache(the client thats giving you that error)

But if you have edited/changed the cache in anyway alredy, then use Toms’ cache editor to get the scroll bar image from another cache and the import it in.

GL

Read full topic
